content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: golden_helmet
inventory=[{"type": "gold_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "crimson_nylium", "quantity": 4, "index": 30}, {"type": "golden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "netherite_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 5, "index": 41}]
thought: I need to craft 5 gold_ingot to craft a golden_helmet. Since I have a gold_block in slot 12, I can craft 9 gold_ingot by placing the gold_block in the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: golden_helmet
inventory=[{"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "gold_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crimson_nylium", "quantity": 4, "index": 30}, {"type": "golden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "netherite_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 5, "index": 41}]
thought: I have crafted the gold_ingot, so I will move them to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9

TASK: Craft an item of type: golden_helmet
inventory=[{"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "crimson_nylium", "quantity": 4, "index": 30}, {"type": "golden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "netherite_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 5, "index": 41}]
thought: Now I need to craft the golden_helmet, which requires placing 5 gold_ingot in the crafting table. I will move the gold_ingot from slot 11 to the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: I have placed 1 gold_ingot in the crafting table, so I will move another gold_ingot from slot 11 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1
